>
[Brooch of Inspiration](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1434)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 110</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This finely cut garnet brooch fills your mind with vigor and occasional bursts of mental clarity. While wearing the brooch, you gain a +1 item bonus to checks to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) with [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) skills.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Brooch of Inspiration (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 110</row>

**Price** 12,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +3 and applies to all checks to Recall Knowledge with any skill. The activation has a frequency of once per 10 minutes, takes only a single action to activate, and you can attempt to Recall Knowledge with any skill.
